seo: Apache OFBiz,命令执行漏洞,RCE,安全漏洞,ERP系统
seo_en: Apache OFBiz,RCE,Command Execution Vulnerability,Security Flaw,ERP System
summary: 该插件用于检测Apache OFBiz系统中存在的远程命令执行漏洞，攻击者可能利用此漏洞在未经身份验证的情况下执行任意代码。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect a remote command execution vulnerability in the Apache OFBiz system. Attackers may exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code without authentication.
